title: Textile, 12th–13th century
medium:
Medium: linen, silk
Technique: cross stitch embroidery on plain weave
description: Fragmentary square of linen cloth crossed horizontally by band with angular S-shapes wiht forced ends reserved on red cross-stitch ground; blue guard strips. Indication of plaided filed on one side of band: blue cross-stitch lines running at right angles to band, red cross-stitch line to it, forming squares.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, 12th–13th century.Medium: linen, silk
Technique: cross stitch embroidery on plain weave. Gift of Frances Morris. 1951-111-34.
